title: Canon USA Black Friday Refurbished Sale is Now Live, EOS R5 $1999
description: Update: Things went out of stock fairly quickly, but there tends to be a replenishment of stock throughout the first day. The annual Canon USA refurbished gear sale is now live! These prices are always the lowest that we'll see in 2024. Inventory does not last long, so if you're on the fence or in [...] Source
author: Canon Rumors
excerpt: Update: Things went out of stock fairly quickly, but there tends to be a replenishment of stock throughout the first day. The annual Canon USA refurbished gear…
text: Oh my... these prices make me drool and wish for lenses I never thought I´d wish for :) Stock will go up and down today, so keep checking it. I do scrape the "in-stock" and prices, but that's not in real time.
